meanings.definition: To cover or provide with straw.
meanings.sent1: She is strawing the garden to protect the plants from the cold.
meanings.sent2: The farmer is strawing the barn floor for the animals to rest on.
meanings.sent3: The kids had a fun time strawing the scarecrow in the field.
meanings.sent4: The artist was strawing the canvas with paint, creating a textured effect.
meanings.sent5: The workers were strawing the roof to insulate the house from heat.

meanings.sent1: The strawing of the field was done to provide warmth for the crops.
meanings.sent2: After the storm, the strawing of the road helped with traction for cars.
meanings.sent3: The strawing of the playground made it look like a giant nest.
meanings.sent4: The strawing of the beach created a cozy spot for picnicking.
meanings.sent5: The strawing of the stage added a rustic charm to the theater production.
